item.title: Videos
item.description: Once upon a time, back when I taught college math, I made a bunch of videos for my students. I’ve collected some of them here, just because. Matrix Operations       Systems of Linear Equations                   Basic Set Theory               Relations and Functions     You can find all my videos on my youtube channel.

item.title: Experienced and Supportive Math Tutor
item.description: Is math a frustrating subject for you? Are you struggling to make sense of it all? I would love to help! My strengths include giving clear explanations, providing a supportive learning environment, and the ability to identify and correct a student’s miscomprehensions. I am particularly good at working with students who have had traumatic mathematical experiences in their past. I love working with students who have been convinced that they are “just not smart in math” and helping them achieve their own mathematical victories.
